entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

Temperature: 0.6°C

Visibility: 19.3 km

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
